info.title: Loan Disbursement Request
info.description:
A request from a borrower to a lender (credit institute) to transfer money from the loan contract to a receiving account at a specific time. The borrower or a loan officer can decide to withhold money from the gross disbursement amount to pay due or expected items. Items can consist of installments or fees.

You can use this API to create, query, read, or cancel a full disbursement, as well as a progressive disbursement for a particular loan contract. When you create a loan disbursement request you can use the propose operation to read default values and additional data.

Note:
The entity data model for loan disbursement request contains a subset of the attributes of the business object of loan disbursement request.

Remark:
The service Loan Disbursement Request is assigned to service group Transactional Banking. 

Use:
Loan Disbursement Request can be used in scenarios where both Full disbursement as well as Progressive disbursement for a particular loan account shall be displayed. The propose loan disbursement request can be used to read default values and additional data for the creation loan disbursement request.

x-sap-shortText: Manage loan disbursement requests using this synchronous inbound service

get.summary: Read Loan Disbursement Request by UUID

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

post.description: Is a request to cancel an individual LoanDisbursementRequest.CancelLoanDisbursementRequest action is bound to LoanDisbursementRequest entity.This action allows to cancel an existing full or partial loan contract disbursement request. Note: The fields marked as nullable can be passed with blank value. But the field name has to be passed always.

parameters.name: UUID
parameters.description:
Is a universal unique identifier of a Loan Disbursement Request.  
GDT:NOSC_UUID

post.description: Is an inquiry to get the proposal with default values of parameters required for a LoanDisbursementRequest.

LoanContractUUID.title: A globally unique identifier for a LoanContract.

GrossAmount.title: GrossAmount is the gross amount of the disbursement.

ValueDate.title: ValueDate is the value date of the disbursement .

PlannedPaymentDate.title: PlannedPaymentDate is the planned payment date of the disbursement.

EligibleWithholdingLoanPaymentPlanItemSe.title: The date at which the selection of eligible withholding loan payment plan item proposal end.

schema.title: Proposed Loan Disbursement Request
schema.description: ProposedLoanDisbursementRequest is the return for the ProposeLoanDisbursementRequest action. This will hold default values  and additional data which can be used for creation of a full or partial disbursement request. Remark: Expand to EligibleWithholdingItems returns the entity WithholdLoanPaymentPlanItem.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET BasicDataLoanDisbursementRequests HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

ReasonCode.title: ReasonCode is the coded representation of the reason for the LoanDisbursementRequest.

ReasonName.title: Name of ReasonCode.
ReasonName.description: GDT: LoanDisbursementRequestReasonCode Note: This will be filled as null if ReasonCode is null.

CancellationReasonCode.title: CancellationReasonCode is the coded representation of the reason for the cancellation of the LoanDisbursementRequest
CancellationReasonCode.description: Note: This will be filled only when LifeCycleStatusCode is 'Canceled'GDT: LoanDisbursementRequestCancellationReasonCode

CancellationReasonName.title: Name of CancellationReasonCode
CancellationReasonName.description: GDT: MEDIUM_Name Note: This will be filled as null if CancellationReasonCode is null.

NetAmount.title: NetAmount is the net amount of the disbursement.
NetAmount.description: GDT:Amount It specifies the gross disbursement amount minus the amounts withheld.

GrossAmount.title: GrossAmount is the gross amount of the disbursement.

BillingItemsWithheldAmount.title: BillingItemsWithheldAmount is the sum of due amount of billing items withheld from the disbursement GrossAmount.

ItemsWithheldAmount.title: ItemsWithheldAmount is the sum of planned amount of items withheld from the disbursement GrossAmount

ActivationChargeAmount.title: An ActivationChargeAmount is the charge amount for activation.
ActivationChargeAmount.description: Note: Will be filled when ActivationChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator is false.GDT: Amount

ValueDate.title: ValueDate is the value date of the disbursement.

PlannedPaymentDate.title: PlannedPaymentDate is the planned payment date of the disbursement.

ActivationChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator.title: Indicates whether charges for activation of the loan disbursement request are requested to be waived.

PaymentTransactionInstructionItems.title: An item describes a single element of a BankContractPaymentTransactionInstruction.
PaymentTransactionInstructionItems.description:
Remark: It is a Complex type defined as a collection
Note: It only holds data for 'Disbursement Payment' process result type. (15 - DisbursementPayment
BDT: BankingBusinessTransactionProcessingResultPaymentTypeCodeNote: During Create the below are the default values used:BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode = 200008 - Loan Contract Utilization (Disbursement),BankingBusinessTransactionProcessingResultPaymentTypeCode = 15 - DisbursementPayment,DebitCreditCode = 2 - Credit.

AssignmentPercent.title: An AssignmentPercent is the assigned percentage for an item which will be applied to the payment thatresults from processing the payment transaction instruction.
AssignmentPercent.description:
Constraints: If provided, the AssignmentPercent must be greater than zero.Only one of the following fields can be provided:  AssignmentPercent, AssignmentAmount.If provided, the cumulated AssignmentPercent must be 100 percent
GDT: Percent

AssignmentAmount.title: An AssignmentAmount is the Amount that is the assignment amount for the Payment Transaction Instruction.
AssignmentAmount.description:
Constraints: If provided, the Amount must be greater than zero.Only one of the following fields can be provided:AssignmentPercent, AssignmentAmount.
GDT: Amount

BankContractPaymentTransactionInstructio.title: A BankContractPaymentTransactionInstructionTypeCode is a coded representation of the type ofa bank contract payment transaction instruction.
BankContractPaymentTransactionInstructio.description:
Constraints: Only the code values 31 - DisbmtByIntBkTransf 32 - DisbmtByDomesticBkTransf 54 - DisbmtByCshPayt 69 - DisbmtBySCT are allowed.Integrity Condition during create:In case of 31 - DisbmtByIntBkTransf ,BankAccountStandardID or BankAccountID, BankRoutingID and CountryCode of CounterpartyBankAccount together have to be filled.HolderName and CurrencyCode is optional.Any other fields if passed will be ignoredIn case of 32 - DisbmtByDomesticBkTransf HolderName, BankAccountStandardID or HolderName, BankAccountID, BankRoutingID, and CountryCode of CounterpartyBankAccount have to be filled.CurrencyCode is optional. Any other fields if passed will be ignored.In case of 54 - DisbmtByCshPayt CounterPartyBankAccount shall not be passed.69 - DisbmtBySCT HolderName, BankAccountStandardID have to be filled BankStandardID is optional .Any other fields if passed will be ignored.
BDT: BankContractPaymentTransactionInstructionTypeCode

CounterpartyBankAccount.title: Contains the bank account to which disbursement amount/premium has to be credited.

MappableIndicator.title: Indicates that CreditDetails of a payment transaction instruction are mappable.
MappableIndicator.description:
MappableIndicator = TRUE indicates that details of a payment transaction instruction items are mappable.Note: MappableIndicator will be set as TRUE if BankContractPaymentTransactionInstructionTypeCode is 31/32/54/69, else it will be set as FALSE.When FALSE it means there are some missing fields in the output structure. So all the fields are not mapped. Ex: Address missing for International Bank Transfer
GDT: Indicator

com.sap.gateway.default.loandisbursement.title: PaymentTransactionInstructionItems
com.sap.gateway.default.loandisbursement.description: An item describes a single element of a BankContractPaymentTransactionInstructionIt is a Complex type defined as a collectionNote: It only holds data for 'Disbursement Payment' process result type. (15 - DisbursementPaymentBDT:BankingBusinessTransactionProcessingResultPaymentTypeCode )Note: During Create the below are the default values used: GDT BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode = 200008 - Loan Contract Utilization (Disbursement),BDT BankingBusinessTransactionProcessingResultPaymentTypeCode = 15 - DisbursementPayment,GDT DebitCreditCode = 2 - Credit.Note: While creating LoanDisbursementRequest we have to pass same attributes for all payment transaction instructions.It means all the records in PaymentTransactionInstructionItem should have the same attributes during POST call.Even if some attributes are not required, we can pass those with blank value to make the request homogeneous.

AssignmentPercent.title: An AssignmentPercent is the assigned percentage for an item which will be applied to the payment thatresults from processing the payment transaction instruction.
AssignmentPercent.description:
Constraints: If provided, the AssignmentPercent must be greater than zero.Only one of the following fields can be provided:  AssignmentPercent, AssignmentAmount.If provided, the cumulated AssignmentPercent must be 100 percent
GDT: Percent

AssignmentAmount.title: An AssignmentAmount is the Amount that is the assignment amount for the Payment Transaction Instruction.
AssignmentAmount.description:
Constraints: If provided, the Amount must be greater than zero.Only one of the following fields can be provided:AssignmentPercent, AssignmentAmount.
GDT: Amount

Constraints: Only the code values 31 - DisbmtByIntBkTransf 32 - DisbmtByDomesticBkTransf 54 - DisbmtByCshPayt 69 - DisbmtBySCT are allowed.Integrity Condition during create:In case of 31 - DisbmtByIntBkTransf ,BankAccountStandardID or BankAccountID, BankRoutingID and CountryCode of CounterpartyBankAccount together have to be filled.HolderName and CurrencyCode is optional.Any other fields if passed will be ignoredIn case of 32 - DisbmtByDomesticBkTransf HolderName, BankAccountStandardID or HolderName, BankAccountID, BankRoutingID, and CountryCode of CounterpartyBankAccount have to be filled.CurrencyCode is optional. Any other fields if passed will be ignored.In case of 54 - DisbmtByCshPayt CounterPartyBankAccount shall not be passed.69 - DisbmtBySCT HolderName, BankAccountStandardID have to be filled BankStandardID is optional .Any other fields if passed will be ignored.
BDT: BankContractPaymentTransactionInstructionTypeCode

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$count](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptioncount) query option.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptiontop)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionskip)

search.name: $search
search.description: Search items by search phrases, see [Searching](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionsearch)
